nodes.bodyText: You might want to have a look at the QA settings, for instance in this job: https://qa.nuxeo.org/jenkins/job/Deploy/job/IT-nuxeo-master-tests-cap-tomcat/configure:

Hi,
about the regular expression  'ERROR.'  ?
do we have to use the same from qa job.
Don't know, I was just pointing at the existing since we want the same behavior.
